February Social

On 8th of February, 20:00 to 22:00 at Ye Olde Chequers Inn

We'd love to bring together small businesses and individuals throughout Tonbridge looking to chat about all aspects of their digital strategy. Whether you're working in technology, the Web or a complete novice/outsider looking for advice then please come along.

Join us for discussion and drinks at Ye Olde Chequers Inn on Tonbridge High Street.

Look out for Calum or James.
